javier ruiz

Software Developer

A brief background

Hey there, I see you've stumbled upon my website! I'm Javier. A 19 year old Software Developer currently studying Computer Science at the University of Waterloo. My interest in both Software and Web development stemmed from my fascination with computers and video games from a very early age. I have a strong passion for developing innovative software and creating unforgettable user experiences. I also mingle with Graphic Design from time to time.

x

Joist

I worked at Joist. It was fun!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

x

Davis + Henderson

Software Developer || May 2015 - Aug 2015

  • Developed a database automation build and deployment system with support for continuous integration and incremental deployment; reduced deployment time by 70%
  • Restructured 60% of the company's databases and integrated them into Team Foundation Server
  • Created multiple Python, Batch, and SQL scripts to be used for text, data, and file manipulation during automation builds
x

Freelance

Motion Graphic Designer || Feb 2011 - Aug 2013

  • Designed and animated custom 5-30 second animations matching client specifications using Cinema 4D, Photoshop, and Adobe After Effects
  • Analyzed and discussed product specifications with clients to achieve optimum quality and full customer satisfaction

Work Experience

"Javier worked with our team to define the needed outcomes, did research, and tried different approaches to find solutions. He contributed significantly to the end product. He is driven, enthusiastic, adaptive, and an excellent team player. He is welcome to return should he desire."
Steve D'Agostinelli
CMS Dev Delivery Manager of D+H
